
# Soft rst
wr 00000004 00000001
wr 00000004 00000000
# PHY rst
wr 00000004 00000002
wr 00000004 00000000
# PHY read_status
wr 00000000 80000000
rd 00000000
wr 00000000 80010000
rd 00000000

# set_phy rgmii_timing_delay
# 21_2.4,5
wr 00000000 40160002
wr 00000000 80150000
rd 00000000
wr 00000000 40151076
wr 00000000 40160000

# set_phy soft_rst
# 0_0.15
wr 00000000 40000000
rd 00000000
wr 00000000 40009140

# set_con phy_status
# set_phy enable_stub_loopback_1000Mbps
